sidebar_label: Ping
---

<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
<!-------------------- THIS MARKDOWN FILE IS AUTOGENERATED -------------------->
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->

A message used to check if a peer is active and calculate their RTT.

### Message Name

`ping`

### Payload

| Parameter        | Type   |            Description            |
|:----------------:|--------|:---------------------------------:|
| `block_height`   | number | The current height of the chain   |
